snippet: After two years of restoration, the restaurant is set to reopen as a polished crown jewel in Central Park.
abstract: Tavern on the Green, after a two-year restoration, is set to reopen April 24.
lead_paragraph: After two years of restoration, the restaurant is set to reopen as a polished crown jewel in Central Park.

headline.main: Tavern on the Green Sparkles Again
headline.print_headline: A Central Park Jewel Sparkles Again
